00049     class EuropaException :public TREX::utils::Exception {
00050     public:
00051       EuropaException(std::string const &msg) throw() 
00052        :TREX::utils::Exception("Europa error: "+msg) {}
00053       virtual ~EuropaException() throw() {}
00054     }; // TREX::europa::EuropaException

00066     class Assembly :public EUROPA::EngineBase, boost::noncopyable {
00067       class TokenManager;
00068     public:
00069       static EUROPA::LabelStr const EXTERNAL_MODE;
00070       static EUROPA::LabelStr const OBSERVE_MODE;
00071       static EUROPA::LabelStr const INTERNAL_MODE;
00072       static EUROPA::LabelStr const PRIVATE_MODE;
00073       static EUROPA::LabelStr const IGNORE_MODE;
00074 
00075       TREX::utils::Symbol name() const;
00076 
00077       bool inactive() const {
00078        return INACTIVE==m_state;
00079       }
00080       bool active() const {
00081        return ACTIVE==m_state;
00082       }
00083       bool invalid() const {
00084        return INVALID==m_state;
00085       }
00086      
00087       DbSolver &solver() const {
00088         return *m_solver;
00089       }
00090       EUROPA::SchemaId const &schema() const {
00091         return m_europa_schema;
00092       }
00093       EUROPA::PlanDatabaseId const &plan_db() const {
00094         return m_plan_db;
00095       }
00096 
00097       bool isAgentTimeline(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) const;
